title: Scientists Studying Omicron in South Africa See Rise in Covid-19 Reinfections
content:
1. Scientists Studying Omicron in South Africa See Rise in Covid-19 Reinfections  The Wall Street Journal

  3. 'Unprecedented' Omicron Surge Hitting Under-5s: South Africa  The Daily Beast
  4. Omicron covid variant has higher risk of reinfection than delta, South Africa researchers say  The Washington Post
  5. WHO says surge team deployed in S.Africa's Gauteng to tackle Omicron  Reuters
